footer.name: Fundación Santísima Trinidad Dr. José Gregorio Hernández 3M
footer.quote: «Most of these people have no means; I will not deny them a consultation, and I will not make them go through the embarrassment of telling me they have no money. God will provide.»

donate.modalTitle: Continue the work of the Doctor of the Poor.
donate.modalBody: José Gregorio Hernández never turned away a patient. He bought medicines with his own salary. Your donation keeps that charity alive in Ecuador.
donate.everyDonation: Every donation, no matter the amount, makes a difference.

stickyBanner.text: Would you like to support our mission?
